review: Really enjoying this stick we have watch full series we missed on TV and lots movies.  Very easy to use.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Amazon Fire TV stick for the most part is a good product. For some reason mine makes a loud 1 second buzz sound randomly throughout viewing when watching Hulu.
author: Jason

review: Have Firestick and Chromecast. Both are great but the stick performs better.
author: jimz

review: This device was very easy to set up and use. I have been using it for about a month now, and have had no problems with it. The user interface is very intuitive and straightforward.
author: andrew randall

review: I'm not so technical so I was surpised that it still had to be plugged into and electrical socket. But all in all, this has been a wonderful experience. We love it!!!Dez
author: Dez

review: Working great on my other tv.
author: Kevin Yang

review: works great. Was a bit hard to get started with it.
author: Amazon Customer "kessmd"

review: Awesome! I can now share my son's Netflix account and listen to Pandora.
author: mka356
